ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Steps up to the bar
ygData.msgSnippet: /emote stands and lightly places his tankard on the table. /emote casts an elemental spell to remove all trace of the existance of one Jen . /emote lets out a
ygData.messageBody:
/emote stands and lightly places his tankard on the
table.
/emote casts an elemental spell to remove all trace of
the existance of one "Jen".
/emote lets out a ferocious growl as he destroys that
evil which "she" spreads.
/emote sets for destruction these "sites" in the plane
of E'Arth. ;P (Oh, and I can.. hehehe I can. ;P )
<Unification Child Protection Agency B#31419nemezi>

Thanks TundraWyrm

> Melefante
